last_episode_to_air.name: The Reckoning
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Zola prepares for her treatment, Shadow takes off for Botswana to settle scores with Cyrus in a dangerous confrontation.

name: Shadow
overview: Haunted by a tragic loss, an ex-cop with a rare inability to feel pain strikes out on his own to catch offenders who've eluded Johannesburg police.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In Johannesburg, tough ex-cop Shadow pursues justice on his own terms and seeks to help those who are powerless to protect themselves.

episodes.name: Mary's Blackmail
episodes.overview: As a rough-hewn cop-turned-vigilante, Shadow defends a client against a murderous, blackmailing mobster.

episodes.name: Snow Globe Killer
episodes.overview: A dancer approaches Shadow for help warding off a stalker: a disturbed man who makes snow globes containing figurines of the young women he targets.

episodes.name: Ashley's Secret
episodes.overview: Zola tells Ashley about the accident that led to her spinal injury. Shadow and Max intervene when Ashley runs afoul of a sinister businessman.

episodes.name: Man Down
episodes.overview: Shadow and Max track down an adversary from the past who's out on parole and set on revenge -- but they walk into a trap.

episodes.name: Ghost Killer
episodes.overview: When a vengeful rooftop shooter wreaks havoc on the city, Shadow and Max enlist Ashley's help to pin him down.

episodes.name: Dare to Die
episodes.overview: When his cash-needy friend gets involved in an online game that pays players to do dangerous stunts, Shadow joins the game to track down its mastermind.

episodes.name: There's Something in the House
episodes.overview: Scully agrees to help find Cyrus. Shadow's cousin Faith is spooked by strange activity around her house -- but there's more to it than meets the eye.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: As Zola prepares for her treatment, Shadow takes off for Botswana to settle scores with Cyrus in a dangerous confrontation.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In Johannesburg, tough ex-cop Shadow pursues justice on his own terms and seeks to help those who are powerless to protect themselves.
